titleStmt.title: The alteration of the coyn, with a feasible method to do it most humbly proposed to both houses of Parliament. To which is annexed, a projection, or scheem of reasonable terms, for establishing a firm and general peace in Europe. / By Thomas Houghton, of Lyme-Street, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Houghton, Thomas, Gent.
Houghton, Thomas, Gent. Europe's glory.

notesStmt.note: Europe's glory has separate t.p., pagination, and register.
Item at reel 107:14 incorrectly identified as Wing (2nd ed.) H2923.
Item at reel 107:14 lacks Europe's glory.
Europe's glory (Wing H2927) appears separately at reel 497:30.
Reproduction of the original at the Columbia University Library (reel 107) and the British Library (reel 1812).
